topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Support Matrix - OLD (reference only)

body.p: To ensure the performance and stability of HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, it is important to meet the requirements and conform to the recommendations listed in this document..

section.title: Support Matrix for the Non-KVM Region Region
section.p: To ensure the performance and stability of the Non-KVM servers running the HP Lifecycle Management environment and HP Helion OpenStack it is important to meet the requirements and conform to the recommendations listed in Support Matrix for the Non-KVM Region.

section.title: Support Matrix for the KVM Region
section.p: To ensure the performance and stability of the systems running KVM region of the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade environment, it is very important to meet the requirements and conform to the recommendations listed in Support Matrix for the KVM Region.
